name.id: Adblocker Unlimited — block ads & browse safe

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e: Blocks annoying ads like pop-ups, video ads, and banners. Blocks malicious redirects, trackers and protects your personal data
short.da: Blocks ads on YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, and others. Removes annoying ads from all websites. Blocks redirects and protects your…
short.et: Free Adblocker with no paid services and subscription. Protect your personal data and remove all annoying ads from all websites
short.fa: Ad Blocker for Youtube. Ad Blocker for Facebook. Ad Blocker for Twitch. Block all Ads. Video Ads Skipper and Blocker
short.hr: Removes banner Ads and pop-ups from all websites. Blocks video Ads on YouTube, Facebook, Twitch, etc. Blocks redirects and data…
short.id: Block ads on Youtube. Block ads on Instagram. Adblocker for Twitter. Adblocker for Facebook.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,de,el,en,en_AU,en_GB,e:
Ad Blocker Chrome extension for blocking Ads on all websites. This adblocker removes:
1)	Banner advertisings
2)	Annoying chat windows
3)	Popup advertisings
4)	Unwanted newtab pages with ads
5)	Malicious redirects by third-party software
6)	Video Ads and Prerolls

Apart from blocking annoying and excessive ads our AdBlocker protects your private information from being collected and transferred by malicious and suspicious websites and software. We block:
•	Personal data collection and transfer
•	Malicious Redirects
•	Browsing history data collection and transfer

With our new advanced Ad Blocker for Chrome you get:
•	Ads-free Internet browsing on all websites
•	Enhanced privacy and personal data protection
•	Faster Internet connection by blocking of unnecessary processes

The Ad Blocker Chrome works on all web pages, as well as all popular social networks and video hosting platforms:
•	Instagram
•	Facebook
•	Twitter
•	YouTube
•	Twitch
and others

Add the AdsBlocker to your Chrome and enjoy surfing
